Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Investments[ENDCOLOR] is one of the new gameplay elements added by Cities in Development. It replaces Gold-rushing. Instead, you use gold to Invest in a Building or Wonder, thereby reducing its base Production cost.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Investing in a Puppet or Colony will incline the AI to focus on that Building. However, in these cities, the Magistrate resource can be used to rush Buildings instead.
